problem.markdown:
if True:
    if False:
        print("Banana")
    else:
        print("Apple")
else:
    if True:
        print("Dates")
    else:
        print("Corn")

The output of the above code is ___

(x) "Apple" ( ) "Banana" ( ) "Corn" ( ) "Dates"
